title: Average ticket price Miami Heat ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013/14 to 2009/10.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2009/10 to 2006/07.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015/16 to 2014/15.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2014/15 to 2013/14.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Miami Heat games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 . In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 56.55 U.S. dollars . Miami Heat - additional information The Miami Heat are an American professional basketball team playing in the National Basketball Association 's ( NBA ) Southeast Division of the Eastern Conference .
